trans-unit.source: Replication enables to copy the content of an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> onto another. Unlike bidirectional replication, simple and hierarchical replication are a one way copy. I.e., the destination server content is not copied back onto the source (unless you specifically define a bidirectional replication).

seg-source.mrk: Replication enables to copy the content of an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> onto another.
Unlike bidirectional replication, simple and hierarchical replication are a one way copy.
I.e., the destination server content is not copied back onto the source (unless you specifically define a bidirectional replication).

target.mrk: La réplication permet de copier le contenu d’un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vers un autre serveur <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Contrairement à la réplication bidirectionnelle, la réplication simple et hiérarchique est une copie unidirectionnelle.
Par exemple, le contenu du serveur de destination n'est pas recopié sur la source (sauf si vous définissez spécifiquement une réplication bidirectionnelle).
Ces configurations de réplication sont supportées :

trans-unit.source: Servers A,B,C,D, etc. to Server N.

seg-source.mrk: Servers A,B,C,D, etc. to Server N.

target.mrk: Servers A,B,C,D, etc. vers Server N.

trans-unit.source: Server A to Server B to Server C to Server A.

seg-source.mrk: Server A to Server B to Server C to Server A.

target.mrk: Serveur A vers Serveur B vers Serveur C vers Serveur A.

trans-unit.source: Replicating an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B is supported only if the two servers are installed on different physical servers (or virtual machines). The servers must have the same architecture, the same operating system, and the same HyperStream version.

seg-source.mrk: Replicating an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B is supported only if the two servers are installed on different physical servers (or virtual machines).
The servers must have the same architecture, the same operating system, and the same HyperStream version.

target.mrk: La réplication d’un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A vers un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B n’est prise en charge que si les deux serveurs sont installés sur des serveurs physiques (ou des machines virtuelles) différents.
Les serveurs doivent avoir la même architecture, le même système d’exploitation et la même version d'HyperStream.

trans-unit.source: The replication starts as soon as the replication destination is created. Ensure that the time to launch the replication is appropriate prior to defining the replication destination.

seg-source.mrk: The replication starts as soon as the replication destination is created.
Ensure that the time to launch the replication is appropriate prior to defining the replication destination.

target.mrk: La réplication commence dès que la destination de réplication est créée.
Ne créez cette destination que lorsque le moment est opportun pour lancer la réplication.

trans-unit.source: To activate the replication of <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B with the Graphical User Interface

seg-source.mrk: To activate the replication of <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B with the Graphical User Interface

target.mrk: Pour activer la réplication du <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A vers le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B en mode graphique

trans-unit.source: Launch the on Server A and log in as the admin user.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the on Server A and log in as the admin user.

target.mrk: Lancez le sur le serveur A et connectez-vous en tant qu'utilisateur administrateur.

trans-unit.source: Provide the name and port number of Server B.

seg-source.mrk: Provide the name and port number of Server B.

target.mrk: Saisissez le nom et le numéro de port du serveur B.

trans-unit.source: To activate the replication of <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B with the Command Line Interface

seg-source.mrk: To activate the replication of <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A to <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B with the Command Line Interface

target.mrk: Pour activer la réplication du <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A vers le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B en mode commande

trans-unit.source: Use the command line only if you cannot access the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> .

seg-source.mrk: Use the command line only if you cannot access the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> .

target.mrk: Utilisez le mode commande uniquement si vous ne pouvez pas accéder à la <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Launch the ade_admin command line interface on Server A as admin.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the ade_admin command line interface on Server A as admin.

target.mrk: Lancez l’interface ligne de commande ade_admin sur le serveur A en tant qu'admin.

trans-unit.source: Run the add_repli <server B>:<port_number> command to add Server B as a replication destination for Server A.

seg-source.mrk: Run the add_repli <server B>:<port_number> command to add Server B as a replication destination for Server A.

target.mrk: Exécutez la commande add_repli <server B>:<port_number> pour ajouter le serveur B comme destination de réplication du serveur A.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the ade_admin command line interface on the source .

target.mrk: Lancez l’interface ligne de commande ade_admin sur le source.

trans-unit.source: Launch the ade_admin command line interface on one of the servers.

seg-source.mrk: Launch the ade_admin command line interface on one of the servers.

target.mrk: Lancez l’interface ligne de commande ade_admin sur l’un des serveurs.

trans-unit.source: - ADE Replicator: TIBERIUM:32323 (ed8ccb38-820a-2e45-a579-018b22f1caab) CONNECTED (59 minutes ago)
- HSS Replicator: TIBERIUM:32323 (ed8ccb38-820a-2e45-a579-018b22f1caab) CONNECTED (59 minutes ago)

The Last synchro parameter, also known as replication lag, displays the date from which you are able to restore data from the replication target server if the replication source is off. If its value is 0, the synchronizing is complete.

seg-source.mrk: The Last synchro parameter, also known as replication lag, displays the date from which you are able to restore data from the replication target server if the replication source is off.
If its value is 0, the synchronizing is complete.

target.mrk: Le paramètre Last synchro, aussi appelé décalage de réplication, indique la date à partir de laquelle vous pouvez restaurer des données si la source est inactive.
Si sa valeur est 0, la synchronisation est terminée.

trans-unit.source: The Rep_in parameter provides the incoming data rate in MB/s, while Rep_out provides the outgoing data rate in MB/s.

seg-source.mrk: The Rep_in parameter provides the incoming data rate in MB/s, while Rep_out provides the outgoing data rate in MB/s.

target.mrk: Le paramètre Rep_in fournit le débit en Mo/s des données reçues, alors que le paramètre Rep_out fournit le débit en Mo/s des données envoyées.
